Field Detail

GATETEXTFILE

public static final String GATETEXTFILE
Name of the temporary file, which is populated with the text of GATE document in order to process it with Minipar

See Also:
Constant Field Values

maxSentenceLength

public static final long maxSentenceLength
The Minipar executable limits the length of a sentence to 1024 characters. If a sentence is longer than the maximal length it is not sent to MINIPAR7

See Also:
Constant Field Values

setMiniparDataDir

public void setMiniparDataDir(URL newMiniparDataDir)
Set the MiniparDataDirectory.. This is the directory that Minipar uses to collect the data for its internal processing. Default location is minipar_home/data

execute

public void execute()
             throws ExecutionException
Execute method is called whenever user clicks on the "RUN" button in GATE GUI. It should be called after the instantiation of the resource. This method first checks for all mandatory runtime parameters, if not provided prompts user by throwing an executionexception. For optional parameters it considers the default values. this method initially given a document, converts the document text into a text file. This text file is then sent to runMinipar function in order to parse it with Minipar.

Specified by:
execute in interface Executable
Overrides:
execute in class AbstractProcessingResource
Throws:
ExecutionException
